<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Alter the cluster reference column from cmdb_ci_vcenter_cluster to cmdb_ci</description>
        <name>Alter clustr ref from vcenter to cmdb_ci</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function alterClusterReference() {
	// Alter the cluster reference column from cmdb_ci_vcenter_cluster to cmdb_ci

	var tables = ['samp_remediation_result', 'samp_entitlement_result', 'samp_licenses_required_by'];
	tables.forEach(function (table) {
		var clusterRecSysID = null;
		new global.GlideQuery('sys_dictionary')
			.where('name', table)
			.where('element', 'cluster')
			.where('reference', 'cmdb_ci_vcenter_cluster')
			.selectOne()
			.ifPresent(function(clusterRec) {
				clusterRecSysID = clusterRec.sys_id;
			});

		if (clusterRecSysID) {
			new global.GlideQuery('sys_dictionary')
				.where('sys_id', clusterRecSysID)
				.update({
					reference: 'cmdb_ci',
				});
		}
	});
}
alterClusterReference();]]></script>
